Class ApplicantUI

java.lang.Object
boundary.ApplicantUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicantMenuUI, ApplicationManagementUI, EnquiryApplicantUI, ProjectViewUI
public class ApplicantUI extends Object implements ProjectViewUI, ApplicationManagementUI, EnquiryApplicantUI, ApplicantMenuUI
The ApplicantUI class serves as the CLI interface for applicants in the BTO Management System. It provides functionalities such as viewing available projects, applying for projects, managing enquiries, viewing application status, and withdrawing applications. This class implements multiple interfaces corresponding to different menu functionalities accessed by an applicant. Interfaces implemented: - ProjectViewUI - ApplicationManagementUI - EnquiryApplicantUI - ApplicantMenuUI

    • ApplicantUI

      public ApplicantUI(ProjectController projectController, ApplicationController applicationController, EnquiryController enquiryController, AuthenticationController authController, FilterController filterController)
      Constructs a new ApplicantUI with the required controllers.
      Parameters:
      projectController - the controller for accessing project-related data
      applicationController - the controller for handling applications
      enquiryController - the controller for managing enquiries
      authController - the controller for user authentication
      filterController - the controller for applying project filters
